item.title: Plunge
item.description: As they say - dont idolize your heroes. Its always disappointing when you see them up close. Such is the case with doyens of technology. And so, this grizzled veteran is in search of another worthwhile campaign, yet again. May the path be kind to these old bones! ðŸ˜‰

item.title: ORA-04091
item.description:
Sounds familiar? A friend encountered it recently.

Mutating table problem from within a row level trigger on running a SELECT on the same table.
